entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. POP 40%

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Fog dissipating after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
